extendedInfo.description: For the first time in a century, the gates of the most incredible candy farm in the world are opening at last. Luckily you are one of the holders of the 5 golden tickets and are invited to a one day tour of Candy Farm.How to play: To start with this game is pretty easy, and then the difficulty of the game would increase with the level completed. The goal of this game is to get each candy from the wrapper to its specified gift box which has the same color as the candy throughout your drawing ribbon. For instance, red to red, green to green. The whole game consists of many cities, different city means different level.The first several levels are rather easy to solve. But please be patient when the levels becomes more and more difficult. You will need to do some brain exercises to solve the puzzles and you can submit your score to online Game Center to compete with other players.

reviews.comment: 2 easy, more levels? Get rid of str8 lines & make it a challenge. Min phone age 12 maybe? 12 year olds can\'t draw str8 lines??

reviews.title: More games like this please!
reviews.comment: An interesting puzzle game that is not match-3. Original idea with great execution.

reviews.comment: Very good puzzle game, some levels really make you think. How do some players have such high scores, aren\'t the scores fixed per puzzle?

reviews.comment: One of the best games on Android - difficulty is just right to make it addictive. Download it now.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This is a very fun and addicting puzzle game. after beating the game I was very satisfied. the game is nearly perfect with a nice tutorial to get you started. I would like to note to the creator that the speed slider was a bit buggy and for a simple fix to just let players to select set speeds. Eg. Slow, medium, fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Adequate
